ch.ethz.twimight
Class UpdaterService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      ch.ethz.twimight.UpdaterService

public class UpdaterService
extends Service

Service, responsible for pulling twitter updates from twitter.com and putting it into the database. TODO: Use Twitter's user stream API for instant updates. The REST API should only be used to populate the DB when a user logs in the first time

Author:
pcarta, thossmann
